subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Sailboats and Sailing
Water Pollution
lead_paragraph: Peter Sowrey, the chief executive of sailing’s governing body, threatened to move all sailing events at next year’s Olympics in Rio de Janeiro out of the polluted Guanabara Bay unless the water is cleaner.
snippet: Peter Sowrey, the chief executive of sailing’s governing body, threatened to move all sailing events at next year’s Olympics in Rio de Janeiro out of the polluted Guanabara Bay unless the water is cleaner.
